name: PONG (with a simulated CRT monitor)
description:
Play classic pong with a friend next to you on the computer! The game features a simulation of a CRT television monitor for that 1972 nostalgia that most of us probably can't relate to!

Controls:

WASD & ARROW KEYS to navigate the interface. Press "esc" or "P" to end the game and restart it, or return to the title menu.

Player One (left side) is controlled with W & S; Player Two (right side) is controlled with the UP & Down Arrows

Objective:

The first person to get past 10 points is much better at the game and the other player should be ashamed and feel obligated to buy the winning player lunch.
